productids.title: Product IDs
productids.description: A list of IDs that identify the products on which to get availability and pricing information.

targeting.title: Targeting
targeting.description: The segments to target. For example, behavioral, age, and gender segments.

producttargeting.title: Product Targeting
producttargeting.description: The Inventory, Delivery, Investement and Distribution ProductTargeting objects to be targeted for the availability request

accountid.title: Account ID
accountid.description: The ID of the account that identifies the buyer, advertiser, and any other stakeholders.

currency.title: Currency
currency.description: The currency used to specify Price. Currency is set for the PRODUCT resource specified in section 2.7 and uses CURRENCY reference data specified in section 4.6.

advertiserbrandid.title: Advertiser Brand ID
advertiserbrandid.description: An ID that uniquely identifies the Brand being advertised.

availabilityfields.title: Availability Fields
availabilityfields.description: Defines the ProductTargeting object metrics that availability is returned as.

grouping.title: Grouping
grouping.description: Defines the ProductTargeting object metrics that the availability output is grouped as.

startdate.title: Start Date
startdate.description: The desired start date for inventory delivery in ISO-8601 format.

enddate.title: End Date
enddate.description: The desired end date for inventory delivery in ISO-8601 format.
